Plugins.name: Plugins
Plugins.description: The particles plugin creates a new gameobject "StatelessParticles" to the Kiwi.GameObject object

params.name: state
params.description: : the state to which the game object belongs

params.name: atlas
params.description: : the texture for the particle object

params.name: x
params.description: : the x position of the game object

params.name: y
params.description: : the y position of the game object

params.name: config
params.description: : the particle configuration object

Kiwi.Plugins.ParticlesGL.name: Kiwi.Plugins.ParticlesGL
Kiwi.Plugins.ParticlesGL.description: The particles plugin creates a new gameobject "StatelessParticles" to the Kiwi.GameObject object

classitems.description:
* @module Kiwi
 * @submodule GameObjects
 * @main StatelessParticles
The default configuration object.
classitems.name: defaultConfig

classitems.description: Returns the state of the particle effect. Either "stopped","started" or "stopping"
classitems.name: state

classitems.description: The type of object that this is.
classitems.name: objType

classitems.description: An array of vectors that conatains generated velocities if useDrawingVectors is true. Used by the particle editor.
classitems.name: drawingVectors

classitems.description: If true, velocity vectors will be stored on particle generation. Used by the particle editor.
classitems.name: useDrawingVectors

classitems.description: A function delegated to return a random number. Used by the particle editor.
classitems.name: rnd

classitems.description: If useRandoms is true, This array will contain pregenerate random numbers which will be used every new generation refresh. Used by the particle editor.
classitems.name: randoms

classitems.description: If true, pregenerate random numbers. Used by the particle editor.
classitems.name: useRandoms

classitems.description: The number of random numbers to generate if useRandoms is true.
classitems.name: numRandoms

classitems.description: The index of the next random number in useRandoms. Used by the particle editor.
classitems.name: nextRandomIndex

classitems.description: The maximum loop length of the system. Used for calculating the timeout when stopping emission. This is calculated when the particles are generated. It can be overridden once the emission has started.
classitems.name: timeoutLength

classitems.description: Get the next random number from the randoms list. Used by the particle editor.
classitems.name: nextRandom

classitems.description: Starts the system emitting particles. Particles will be regenerated each time.
classitems.name: startEmitting

params.name: loop
params.description: : Set to true for continuous looping. Overrides and updates the config loop setting.

params.name: removeOnComplete
params.description: : if not looping, then the gameobject will destroy itself after one full emission cycle.

params.name: numParts
params.description: : the number of particles to generate, set on the config object - if not provided the current config value will be used

classitems.description: Stops the system from emitting particles.
classitems.name: stopEmitting

params.name: immediate
params.description: : stops the emitter and removes any existing particles.

params.name: remove
params.description: : if true the gameobject will mark itself for removal either immediately, or after a completed cycle.

classitems.description: Schedules the particle effect to stop (discontinue rendering), and optionally marks the gameobject for removal.
classitems.name: scheduleStop

params.name: milliseconds
params.description: : the delay time in milliseconds before being marked for removal.

params.name: remove
params.description: : mark the gameobject for removal.

classitems.description: Immediately marks the gameobject for removal.
classitems.name: remove

classitems.description: Sets the configuration object and optionally regenerates particles and sets runtime properties.
classitems.name: setConfig

params.name: config
params.description: : the new configuration object

params.name: doGenerate
params.description: : immediately regenerate particles

params.name: doUniforms
params.description: : apply runtime properties

classitems.description: Generates particles based on configuration object.
classitems.name: _generateParticles

classitems.description: Instructs the renderer to draw the particles.
classitems.name: renderGL

classitems.description: Returns a point on a unit arc based on a total number of points and an index
classitems.name: regularPointCirclePerimeter

params.name: a
params.description: : the start angle of the arc

params.name: b
params.description: : the end angle of the ard

params.name: index
params.description: : the point index

params.name: total
params.description: : the total number of points

classitems.description: Returns a point on a unit arc
classitems.name: randomPointCirclePerimeter

params.name: a
params.description: : the start angle of the arc

params.name: b
params.description: : the end angle of the ard

classitems.description: Returns a point within the sector of a circle
classitems.name: randomPointCirclePerimeter

params.name: a
params.description: : the start angle of the sector

params.name: b
params.description: : the end angle of the sector

classitems.description: Returns a point within the unit square
classitems.name: randomPointRect

classitems.description: Returns a point on the perimeter of the unit square
classitems.name: randomPointRectPerimeter

classitems.description: Returns a point on a unit line based on a total number of points and an index.
classitems.name: regularPointLine

params.name: radians
params.description: : the angle of the line

params.name: index
params.description: : the point index

params.name: total
params.description: : the total number of points

classitems.description: Returns a point on a unit line.
classitems.name: regularPointLine

params.name: radians
params.description: : the angle of the line

classitems.description: The name of this plugin.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: The version of this plugin.
classitems.name: version

classitems.description: Registers this plugin with the Global Kiwi Plugins Manager if it is avaiable.
